subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Goaltender Martin Brodeur says he is still a work in progress, even though he has won 551 games and has made more than 22,000 saves in his remarkable 15-year N.H.L. career.
snippet: Goaltender Martin Brodeur says he is still a work in progress, even though he has won 551 games and has made more than 22,000 saves in his remarkable 15-year N.H.L. career.
